1490620.name: Pray And Spray
1490620.description: Pray And Spray is an online first person action shooter. It's fast paced and competitive. You must place yourself in the center of warfare GUNS BLAZING! Face off your opponents in multiple game modes. Play with your friends or battle against them. Fight against bots or random online players. Customize your profile and compete in tournaments. Enter the battlegrounds today and show off your skills!
1490620.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
